detail.description:
Ung dung vay tien thong minh va than thien nhat APP Store, KHONG THU PHI TRUOC, VAY TRA GOP, CHI PHI MINH BACH, TI LE DUYET VAY CAO, thai do phuc vu tot.
VCASH la nen tang P2P Lending, ung dung cong nghe de ket noi nguoi co nhu cau vay va nha dau tu, voi chi phi hop ly nhat cho nguoi vay va doi da hoa loi nhuan cho nha dau tu.

[VCash la gi?]
VCash la ung dung cho vay tra gop co the giup khach hang giai quyet cac van de tai chinh cua ban than, day la mot ung dung thong minh, de dang su dung, khach hang co the nhan duoc khoan vay trong vong 10 phut.

[What is VCash]
VCash is an installment loan APP which can help customers solve their financial problems, it's smart and easy to use, most of the customers can get loan with in 10 minutes.

[Cach su dung VCash]
1.  Tai ung dung VCash va dang ky tai khoan tai APP
2.  Chon han muc vay va thoi han vay
3.  Dien thong tin va xac minh thong tin cua ban
4.  Xet duyet khoan vay va tien hanh giai ngan

[How to use VCash]
1. Download the VCash and Register a account in the App.
2. Choose loan amount and loan term.
3. Fill in personal form and Verify your identity.
4. Loan review and cash disbursement.

[Tai sao lai chon VCash]
1.  Khong can giay to, khong can the chap, khong can bao lanh
2.  Ma PIN bao mat dam bao bao ve toi da thong tin ca nhan cua ban
3.  Nhan vien than thien va cham soc khach hang dat tieu chuan

[Why choose VCash]
1. No paperwork needed ;No collaterals and guarantee required.
2. Lots of options to cash out；including: GCash, MLhuillier, Cebuana, LBC, or your own Bank and etc.
3. Personal security PIN ensures maximum protection over your identity.
4. Good staff and good customer service.


[Product introduction]
Loan amount: ₱ 10,000.00 - ₱ 50,000.00
Loan term: 91 days- 120 days(installment)
Interest rate: Maximum interest rate is 10%

If your loan amount is ₱ 10,000, the interest rate is 10%, and the loan is 91 days, then on the due date, the amount payable is ₱ 10,249.3 (10,000 * 10% / 365 * 91 + 10,000).

Transaction fee: zero

[Private Policy]
VCash protects the privacy of all consumers and we do not provide any consumer information to any party without your consent.

[Contact us]
Have problem to use VCash？
Please contact our online service for help.


Working time: 8am-17pm(Mon-Fri)
Website: https://vcash.pesoloan.ph
Phone: 09052461758
Address: Highstreet South Corporate Plaza Tower, Taguig City, Philippines
